keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The Feb. 15 deadline was extended until April 30 because many people did not realize they faced escalating penalties for not having health coverage.

headline.main: Last Chance to Sign Up Under Affordable Care Act Is Thursday

snippet: The Feb. 15 deadline was extended until April 30 because many people did not realize they faced escalating penalties for not having health coverage.
